summary: Weather app on Internet Computer with location-based current weather, advice/warnings (with emoji), and updated branding/name (Weather Gizmos / W Tracking). Additional requests include splash/logo screen, credits/names, and improving installability/link sharing; current blocker is a non-working location button.

architectural_notes: Architecture includes an ICP Motoko backend canister with generated Candid bindings consumed by a React/Vite frontend.
Frontend uses Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui component set; custom ESLint rules enforce Internet Identity provider usage and prevent problematic BigInt usage in query keys.
Frontend integrates external geocoding and weather APIs via service modules and React hooks.
Build template includes scripts to resize/prune generated images and a deploy script/config for ICP.
known_issues: Location button is not working (user reports location action failing).
